name: Alone: Season1
description:
Alone : Season 1

Alone is an adventure genre game with the theme of fantasy, in this game you will use a character named James. James is a Homugoku, Homugoku is the chosen person who has the power to defeat the forces of evil. And he must bear a very big sin and James will start a new adventure as homugoku and will destroy his sins. Watch more about the story by downloading the game Alone: Season1
